data.text: Thailand Bicycle Touring Itenerary
Hello, I am going for a cycle ride in Thailand in November, If anyone is having any itinerary please help me, I will do Pattaya and Phuket. Please guide me. Thank you so much in advanceâ€¦
We will be riding from phuket uo north late November maybe we will see you there. Enjoy!! komoot has some good rides or
data.author: Mardelle N David Hudson

data.text:
If you please help me with a itinerary, also please have a look to my website www.bikquest.com
Bikquest Adventure
bikquest.com
data.author: Somnath Banerjee

data.text: there are a couple of routes but if you use Komoot app and put in your start and finish it will show you along the way
data.author: Mardelle N David Hudson
Mardelle N David Hudson

data.text: so ur going from Pattaya to Phuket? not much choice, follow the east coast till you hit Chumphon via Cha Am- Hua Hin- Prachup khiri khan, than head west to Ranong and you hit the water an continue south via Khao lak , Takupa an on to Phuket. nice ride
data.author: Richard Reitman

data.text: I will be coming to Bangkok then I will start my ride, I just thought to visit those places
data.author: Somnath Banerjee

data.text: forget Pattaya>>> Head south to Phuket, take ya 8-12 days...
data.author: Richard Reitman

data.text: Thank you so much
data.author: Somnath Banerjee

data.text:
some info on routes on our 'old' website: www.bikeparadise.nl Enjoy
www.bikeparadise.nl
bikeparadise.nl
data.author: Saskia de Groot

data.text: Thank you so much, It will definitely help me to plan my ride
data.author: Somnath Banerjee

data.text: we use The app Pocket Earth pro wherever we ride. Off line maps you download beforehand. Smallest trails and alleys are on there. And icons of hotels, campgrounds etc. Sadly enough for IPhone only.
data.author: Saskia de Groot

data.text: Are you taking own bike or hiring one in Thailand?
data.author: Graham Cullen

data.text: I will take my bike
data.author: Somnath Banerjee

data.text: Please guide me, I am not a professional cyclist, Just want to travel the whole world
data.author: Somnath Banerjee

data.text: To help me guide you, how many kilometres a day do you wish to cycle?
data.author: Graham Cullen

data.text: Also will you be bikepacking and carrying all your luggage on your bike.
data.author: Graham Cullen

data.text: Depending on your budget you could also consider riding with a tour group such as Siam Bike Tours Cycling Thailand
data.author: Graham Cullen

data.text: Sir I will speak with them
data.author: Somnath Banerjee

data.text: Forget Pattaya!
data.author: Graham Cullen

data.text: Start in Hua Hin and head south. Life is bad Prachuap Kiri Khan Ban Krut Thani Letter Nakhon Si Thammarat Phattalung Page Krabi
data.author: Graham Cullen

data.text: These are just suggestions. So much to see on the way. Be flexible in your plans. No need to book accommodation in advance.
data.author: Graham Cullen

data.text: Once in Phuket you could also spend a few days around island
data.author: Graham Cullen

data.text: Thank you so much for your support, If anything comes up in your mind please guide me
data.author: Somnath Banerjee

data.text: Hey.. let's connect.. I'll share some details tomorrow ðŸ˜€
